jobDescription: GENERAL SUMMARY & SCOPE The Business Intelligence Analyst is responsible for developing innovative solutions that meet business reporting objectives as well as ensuring daily reporting gets to the business on time and accurately. This individual will serve as the liaison between IT and business partners to actualize data requests and functional delivery of business reporting needs. The candidate will support projects through the solution development lifecycle and creating ad-hoc reports on an as needed basis. PRINCIPAL JOB DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES (*Essential Functions) Maintains daily report distribution and accuracy.Analyzes business intelligence data and provides reports. Assesses data extraction, report generation and bugs appearing in operations involving the data warehouse or applicable reporting applications. Synthesizes current business intelligence or trend data to support recommendations for action.Documents specifications for business intelligence or information technology (IT) reports, dashboards, or other outputs.Develop data models to support merchandising, planning, and inventory reporting and analytical needs.Performs ad hoc projects related to the entire supply chain, and summarize results using verbal, written, and formal presentation techniques.Determines business information needs and identifies system requirements. Analyzes systems to support desired needs. Ensures that the use of business intelligence applications enhances business decision making capabilities. Requirements
